headline: 2 Dividend Stocks and 1 ETF Up Between 8% and 11% That Are Screaming Buys Before the New Year
summary: It's been a great year for the broader indexes, but recent market volatility may have some investors wondering if now is a good time to sell stocks.  Sherwin-Williams (NYSE: SHW), Air Products and Chemicals (NYSE: APD), and the Global X MLP ETF (NYSEMKT: MLPA) are up between 8% and 11% year to date.  Daniel Foelber (Sherwin-Williams): It's been another solid year for residential, commercial, and industrial paint and coatings supplier Sherwin-Williams.
